title: Interpretation of a black dog in a dream by Ibn Sirin and Al-Nabulsi regarding good and evil

preview.html: Learn about the interpretation of a black dog in a dream and what its symbols are in reality. Dogs are generally considered one of the favorite animals for many adults and young people. Some prefer to own them, take care of them, care for them, and enjoy playing with them, and on the other hand, some tremble when they see them, especially if they are large dogs. The black dog in a dream is one of the things that people search for a lot and talk about on social media, and the reason for the spread of this vision and the many dreams about it may be that the dog is one of the most common animals around people and there is a constant and direct interaction between them as it is based on many personal and human-related matters in his professional life, as there are many types of it, including the hunting dog and the guard dog accompanying the blind and other types. Often the dog is a pet, but it is a loyal friend to people and a close friendship can be formed between them, but at the same time, dogs include wild species such as wolves and foxes that can attack people and cause serious injuries, which makes seeing them for some reason causes fear and anxiety about the future, so we explain in the encyclopedia that you have all the details to see dogs in a dream, such as a dog attack, biting, as well as a pet dog. So follow usInterpretation of seeing black dogs in a dream by Ibn SirinIbn Sirin gave different interpretations of seeing a black dog in a dream in the following cases:If a man sees a black pet dog in a dream, this symbolizes that the dreamer is a person who enjoys love and loyalty from those around him. Unlike the previous vision, seeing a black dog in a dream symbolizes the presence of an evil person in the dreamer's life. Seeing a dog in a dream indicates the presence of a woman with bad morals in the dreamer's life. If a man sees a black dog tearing his clothes in a dream, this is one of the undesirable visions that symbolize the dreamer's scandal in reality, and God knows best. Seeing a black dog biting a black dog in a dream means that there are enemies in the dreamer's life who were able to defeat him, and it also indicates that he will be exposed to a big problem that he cannot solve. One of the symbols of the black dog in a dream is that it indicates the worries and problems that the dreamer suffers from. The black dog, which was obedient and affectionate in the dream, symbolizes the love that the dreamer enjoys because he is a social person with a commendable nature and has many good and loyal friends. While the black wild dog in the dream shows many The hidden hostilities and grudges inside him and wish him harm. Ibn Sirin narrates about a black dog biting a dreamer in a dream, about the possibility of causing him great harm or a disaster that is difficult to get out of and overcome. Likewise, the black dog that bites the fortune teller is a sign of the strength of the enemies over him and their victory over him. The black dog that attacks the dreamer and allows him to tear his clothes symbolizes the evil that the dreamer is exposed to and leads to the disclosure of secrets that he tried to hide and does not want the world to know. The black dog in a dream in general is anxiety, distress and sadness in the dreamer's life.

A black dog in a dream in general represents anxiety, distress, and sadness in the life of the dreamer.

title: Various symbols and signs in the interpretation of comprehensive dreams by Ibn Sirin

preview.html: The comprehensive interpretation of Ibn Sirin Ibn Sirin is considered one of the well-known and famous dream interpretation scholars, so we find many searching for the comprehensive interpretation of dreams by Ibn Sirin, to find in it the most prominent interpretations contained in it and the most important interpretations among. Sirin. About Ibn Sirin. Before we get to know the most important symbols in the complete interpretation of dreams by Ibn Sirin, we will familiarize ourselves through a different site with a small overview of Ibn Sirin, where we find that the scholar Ibn Sirin is named Abu Bakr Muhammad. Ibn Sirin Al-Basri, and he was named after the city in which he was born, as he was born in Basra in the year 653. In fact, the Arab scholar Ibn Sirin is a famous and skilled scholar. Specialized in dream interpretation and vision interpretation. He excelled at interpreting many different dreams. Moreover, he is one of the great followers of the Imam in the science of hadith and jurisprudence. On the other hand, the scholar Ibn Sirin was distinguished by faith, piety, and piety, as he was known for his justice and obedience to his parents, and despite Imam Ibn Sirin’s knowledge and high status, he was blind when he received knowledge. In the hands of the imams Anas bin Malik, Abu Hurairah, Abdullah bin Omar bin Al-Khattab, and Zaid bin Thabit, may God be pleased with them all. It should be noted that there are many who received their training at the hands of the knowledgeable Imam Ibn Sirin, so we find that he taught Ayoub Al-Sakhtiani, Qatada bin Du’amah, and many others who benefited from his knowledge. In the interpretation of dreams and dreams. Visions. Furthermore, Ibn Sirin died at the age of 76. One year he spent all of this in interpreting dreams and understanding the principles of religion. Symbols and connections from the comprehensive interpretation of Ibn Sirin’s dreams. There are certain symbols and signs that came from the mighty scholar Ibn Sirin in interpreting various dreams and visions, and among the most important of these symbols is what can be identified as follows: The snake: The snake in The dream symbolizes the enemy, and if someone sees a snake inside his house in a dream, then this is evidence of the presence of an enemy among his family, relatives, or those who live with him. Cat: A cat in a dream indicates a cunning person, such as if a person sees a cat in a dream, then this is evidence that one of them He has deceived him and wants to harm him. Money: Seeing money or paper money indicates getting rid of problems and removing worries, God willing. Silver: Silver in a dream symbolizes sustenance and goodness that comes after hardships and heartaches. Lion: Ibn Sirin explained that a lion in a dream indicates Unjust, such as if a person sees a lion in a dream, this is evidence of the presence of an unjust person in the dreamer’s life, so caution must be done. Fish: The fish symbolizes goodness and abundance, but if the fish is on the bed or bed, it may indicate bad and unpleasant things. Read Also: What did Ibn Sirin and Al-Nabulsi say about the interpretation of seeing a dead father in a dream? Ibn Sirin’s Dream Interpretation Dictionary (from the letter A to the letter Kha) Many wonder how to obtain Ibn Sirin’s comprehensive interpretation of dreams, and from here it becomes clear that through the Dream Interpretation Dictionary, The most prominent interpretations of Ibn Sirin can be identified as follows: The needle: In an unmarried girl’s dream, the needle indicates marriage, while in

title: Interpretation of a dream about high waves and surviving them

preview.html: Interpretation of seeing high waves and escaping from them in a dream for a single girl An unmarried woman saw that the waves of the sea were high, and she escaped from them in a dream, and no harm would come to her. It shows that she will face many problems in her life and will succeed in escaping from them. It also explains that she lives in great crises, but God will make his wisdom to end them. An unmarried girl who swims and sees high waves of the sea in a dream will be saved from them in a dream. This indicates that there is an evil man approaching her, but God protects her from him. It also indicates the entry of an abnormal friend into her life and she must warn him strongly. And seeing an unmarried woman that she sees a very high wave in a dream, and she was saved from it in a dream. It explains here that he will indulge in great psychological disturbances and must get closer to God. The dream also explains the bad things that she does in her life and does not fix them. See also: Interpretation of seeing the sea in a dream by Imam al-Sadiq Interpretation of seeing high waves and escaping from them in a dream for a married woman Seeing that a married woman sees sea waves in a dream, but she looks from afar. Indicating that she escaped from a big problem in her family, but God Almighty Save her from it. It explains that she will be wronged by someone close to her in her life, but God will save her soon. And the married woman who sees high waves in a dream, and gets rid of them without harm. This is an indication that she has escaped from major problems in her life and that she should get closer to God Almighty. It also indicates that she will go through some bad circumstances, but God's mercy is vast, God willing. And the married woman who sees in a dream that she sees high and strong sea waves in a dream. This indicates marital problems and an unstable life to live in during this period. But God willing, you will end it if the sea waves are far from her in the dream. Interpretation of seeing a high wave and saving from it in a dream for a divorced woman The vision of a divorced woman was that she sees the sea waves very high and very close to her in a dream. This indicates that she will fall into psychological crises and major problems in her life during this period. And soon God Almighty will save her from this, God willing, without harm or harm. And the divorced woman who sees that the sea has very high waves in a dream, and God Almighty saved her. Here it explains that she will fall into a great predicament in her life after her separation About her ex-husband. And that God makes things easy for her and ends her problems and difficulties, God willing. And seeing a divorced woman in a dream that the waves were very high in the dream and she was afraid. This indicates that there are some debts that she has at this time in her life. But God Almighty helps her to end them very soon and God knows best. Interpretation of seeing a high wave and escaping from it in a dream about a man and its meaning A dream that a person saw a wave in the sea and God Almighty saves him in a dream. It indicates that he will face great losses in his own work. And that God Almighty replaces them with good deeds and goodness in his life, God knows best. And the man who swims in a dream and the waves are very high next to him in a dream and saves him from it. This is a sign that he will

title: Interpretation of a dream about someone watching you by Ibn Sirin

preview.html: Interpretation of a dream about someone watching you: It is one of those visions that strike the beholder with astonishment, curiosity, and many questions about its interpretation, but this vision is one of those visions that do not bode well for its owner, and it is not one of the visions worthy of praise. That its owner will be exposed to some problems and harms in his life. Interpretation of a dream about someone watching me: To dream of someone watching me in a dream is one of the visions that indicate the adversities that the dreamer will face in his life in the coming period, and he must pay attention to those around him and not trust some of his colleagues. If a trader sees in a dream that He is watching someone, this vision is not good for him and indicates the large financial loss that this trader will incur in his trade in the coming period. It also indicates that he will incur losses in some business projects that he undertakes. If someone sees that he is watching another person in a dream, This dream indicates the dreamer’s inability to make a decision regarding some of the problems he faces during this time. Interpretation of the dream of someone watching you by Ibn Sirin Ibn Sirin interprets the dream of watching a person as one of the dreamer’s bad dreams. If the dreamer sees that there is someone watching him and that the dreamer is actually working as a manager Or he has a high position in his job, then this dream indicates that the dreamer will lose his position and this vision also means that there are dangers that the dreamer may face and he must be careful. When the dreamer sees that he is observing a person in a dream, it is interpreted that the dreamer is doing some bad and wrong actions and walking in A bad road and one should be careful about it. Interpretation of a dream about someone following you for singles When an unmarried girl sees in a dream that she is being watched by an evil doer, this dream indicates obstacles and anxiety that will appear in the dreamer’s life these days, but he will face them and get rid of them in A short time. If a single girl sees that someone she does not know is watching her, this vision indicates that she will be exposed to some crises and worries, and the vision can also indicate that there is someone who wants to get close to her. If an unmarried virgin sees that there is someone watching her in a dream, smiling at her and showing affection. With love on his face, this vision indicates that she is working hard in some matters and that God will achieve them. Order soon. What is the interpretation of a man chasing me free? If an unmarried girl sees a man chasing her in a dream, this means that she is suffering from excessive anxiety because of some things that await her. When a girl sees in a dream that there is a man she knows is chasing her, this vision It indicates that she will be close to someone who loves her and will live in stability and happiness. However, if she sees someone she does not know chasing her, this indicates that she has high intelligence, acumen, strength, and will to achieve her goals. It also shows that she will succeed and excel in her studies or work. If an unmarried woman sees that a dead person is chasing her In a dream, the vision indicates that this person should give alms to his soul and remember him in supplication. However, if she sees that the dead person is following her and wants her painfully, then this dream is not good and shows the bad things that will happen to her. Interpretation of a dream about seeing someone

title: Interpretation of goats in a dream

preview.html: Seeing goats, goats and sheep for a single girl, for a married woman, for a pregnant woman, for a divorced woman, for a married or unmarried woman, whether the herd is white, brown, black, slaughtering, eating meat, buying, selling and drinking milk according to Ibn Sirin, etc. Seeing a goat in a dream is a sign of perseverance, will and stubbornness to achieve demands. Life and its goals, ambitions and strong desires, because goats are sheep that tolerate living in the desert and barren areas high in the mountains or plains. Seeing a goat on the top of a mountain in the dreamer’s dream is a sign of ambition, and a goat in a plain or meadow portends abundant livelihood and easy access to money, and seeing cute goats covered With hair and hair is a sign of a good woman or one who reaches her husband by benefiting from her. A man feeding a goat portends his marriage or his goodness reaching him through a woman, and seeing goats climbing trees and eating from tree leaves is an indication of the man’s or woman’s food in general. The birth of a goat in a dream to see A pregnant woman in her dream, as if she were a goat, giving birth means her imminent date of birth, and the birth of a goat in a married woman’s dream is a sign of pregnancy soon, God willing, or a harbinger of the birth of twins. For goats, she gives birth to 2 to 3 goats at a time, while seeing a goat giving birth in a girl’s dream Single or in a man’s dream, there is a sign and good news in general. Drinking goat’s milk in a dreamDrinking goat’s milk in a dream indicates a lot of goodness and benefit that accrues to the dreamer, whether material or moral, because goat’s milk is one of the best and most distinguished types of milk. Seeing a herd of goats in a dream: Seeing a herd of goats in a dream is considered grazing and displaying in an organized, natural, and calm way, which indicates success, stability, and achieving desired goals, whether financially or socially. Seeing a shepherd in a dream Sheep are like goats or sheep, and seeing a shepherd herding his sheep in a dream is evidence On the highness and status of the person seeing it; Because the shepherd here refers to the ruler, imam, or scholar, and he is a person of great status and position in society. White goat in a dream. Seeing a white goat in his dream indicates the personality and characteristics of the fortuneteller himself. Black goat in a dream. As for the black goat, contrary to the interpretation of the white goat in the dream, it indicates The mysterious, controlling, and stubborn personality. Slaughtering a goat and eating it in a dream. As for slaughtering a goat in a dream, it indicates marriage in a single person’s dream. As for a woman’s dream of seeing a goat being slaughtered, it indicates good news that will happen in the near future and fulfill her desires. Solo marriage or pregnancy for a married woman and other desires. It is generally considered that a vision of eating goat meat in a dream, cooked, indicates a halal diet and blessings, and goat blood portends the death of worries. Interpretation of a small goat in a dreamInterpretation of seeing a small or small goat in a dream? Al-Mahmoud Al-Tayeb in work and diet: Seeing buying goats in a dream. As for buying goats or buying sheep in general, it indicates the benefit that the viewer gains from the work or activity that he is currently practicing, live.

title: Interpretation of a dream that I forget in a dream

title: Seeing grilled fish in a dream is for singles, married people and men

preview.html: And if he asks for food, God will make it easy for him, and the vision of a married woman of grilled fish is optimistic about hope, kindness and blue things in her life. Interpretation of seeing grilled fish in a dream for a single girl If an unmarried woman sees in a dream that she is longing for grilled fish and looking for it. An indication that she is trying to complete something in her life, and is looking for an end or conclusion for it, and God knows best. And the unmarried woman who sees in a dream that she is eating a lot of grilled fish, and it was very delicious in the dream and easy to digest. A sign that he will meet new people from the number of fish he ate in the dream. And the unmarried woman who saw that she was looking for grilled fish, and found it far from her in the dream. D- The meaning is that he will receive knowledge in a place far from her, and will face trips and hardships in his life. And the unmarried girl who in a dream looks at grilled fish and cannot eat it in the dream and is afraid of it. There is someone here who will propose marriage and try to reject it because she fears the idea of ​​​​marriage in her life. See also: Seeing raw fish in a dream for divorced, married and single women Interpretation of seeing grilled fish in a dream for a married woman A married woman was seen preparing a lot of Grilled fish in a dream and she is happy with this dish in a dream. An indication that she will succeed in freeing her life from poverty and lack of money and that she will enjoy good things in her life. A married woman sees her husband in a dream eating grilled fish and desires it very much. It announces that he will marry her again according to the number of fish he ate in the dream, and God knows best. And seeing a married woman searching in a dream for grilled fish and does not find it except in a distant place in a dream. It indicates that she will face major problems in her professional life, including traveling to a place far from her husband and children. The dreamer was preparing grilled fish in a dream for her children, and they were very hungry in the dream. Here it indicates that he will succeed in keeping them, raising them and treating them well in their lives, and God is higher and more knowledgeable. Interpretation of seeing grilled fish in a dream for a divorced woman If the divorced woman sees that her husband wants to eat fish in her house, and kisses him in a dream. Indicating that she will return again to her ex-husband, and live with him in abundance and great goodness, God willing. As for the divorced woman who dreams of searching for grilled fish and gets angry because she did not find it in a dream. An indication that she will face major problems in her life that she cannot get rid of Easily, and God is Most High and All-Knowing. And the divorced woman who sees grilled fish in a dream, and eats it greedily in a dream, and longs for it. The clear interpretation is that she will see someone close to her traveling to a faraway place and will be sad about it. This is how the dreamer who in the dream looks at grilled fish and it was in bad condition in the dream, and its taste did not taste good. An indication that she will face problems in her life and in her livelihood and great difficulties in the problems she is going through, and God knows best. title: The meaning of a bad smell in a dream about good and evil according to Ibn Sirin and Ibn Shaheen

preview.html: Seeing a bad smell in a dream is undesirable and can be annoying sometimes, because a bad smell in normal life is something that harms us and we never like it and do not reject it very much. Therefore, the bad smell in a dream is a reflection from your subconscious mind of something unpleasant, perhaps in your life or in the life of another person with whom you have a family or friendship relationship. Therefore, the encyclopedia website in this article explains to you the meaning of this dream and for single, married, and man, because each case has a special interpretation. Bad smell in a dream. Bad smell in a dream is a symbol of gossip, bad reputation, and what is said about you behind your back. It also refers to people who suddenly enter our lives without our will. Such a smell is to harm us. Some interpretive scholars also indicate that the bad smell is only a sign of... God Almighty believes that the dreamer has many sins and bad deeds that harm people. Interpretation of a bad smell in a dream for a single woman: If an unmarried girl sees in her dream that she is sitting in her house, and a bad smell comes from outside, and she thinks that it smells good at first, then this is evidence of someone... He pretends to be friendly to her face, but there is a lot of gossip behind her back. They try to give her a bad name because of the hatred and jealousy that fills their hearts towards the insight. And if she sees that after smelling the smell she opened the windows and got rid of it, this means that she will forget that what is said about her is not true and she will prevail over Her enemies, God willing. If a girl sees that one of her relatives is the one who smells bad, this means that there will be a dispute between them and that her opinion of this person will change because he is trying to hide something, and this thing can. It harms her. If a girl sees that a bad smell is coming out of her, this means that she is doing something shameful and she must stop, because it will appear soon because of the difficulty of hiding the bad smell, as well as its side effects. Whoever sees that she is receiving guests in her house who come with a foul smell, this means that there is a young man who intends to marry her, but he is of bad character and reputation, and she should not agree and beware of his evil. . She knows very well that denying him is good for her because she is an absolutely unfit person. Interpretation of a bad smell in a dream for a married woman: Seeing a married woman expelling a bad smell in her dream means that she is not a good woman in her home. If she neglects her children and cares about her home and her husband, and that her husband is dissatisfied with her, then she must take care. In the affairs of her home and manage it again in a way that befits them as a good family, and what was cut off between the members of love and compassion will be restored through alienation and neglect. She must approach God Almighty, as perhaps her neglect in her home will be accompanied by a neglect of obedience, which will make her in need of forgiveness. If she sees a married woman soon or A friend enters her house and smells bad, it means that this person is jealous of her house and his family and is not good for them, and perhaps he has plans to demolish this house and break up the family so he does not feel that you are better than his family. This smell can also be the problems and conflicts that you will face

Interpretation of a bad smell in a dream for a married woman Seeing a married woman expelling a bad smell in her dream means that she is not a good woman in her home. And that she neglects her children and takes care of her home and her husband, and that her husband is not satisfied with her, so she must take care of the affairs of her home and manage it again in a manner befitting them as a good family, and restore what was cut off between the members of love and mercy by alienation and neglect. And she must get closer to God Almighty, perhaps her neglect in her home is accompanied by ignoring obedience, which makes her in need of forgiveness. If a married woman sees a relative or friend entering her house and his smell is bad, this means that this person is jealous of her home and family and is not good for them, and perhaps he has plans to demolish this home and break up the family so that he does not feel that you are better than his family. This smell can also be the problems and conflicts that she will face

title: Interpretation of a mouse in a dream by Ibn Sirin

preview.html: Interpretation of a mouse in a dream by Ibn Sirin The mouse is one of the types of animals belonging to the rodent family. A mouse often hesitates in a person's dream and wakes up afraid that he does not understand the interpretation of this dream and what it indicates, so in the following lines we present the interpretation of seeing a mouse in a dream and everything related to this. Vision, according to what scholars have narrated from the interpretation of dreams, there are many interpretations of seeing a mouse in a dream, and sometimes it brings goodness, and sometimes it has bad connotations and a warning message from God to the fortuneteller. Let us learn more through this article. Interpretation of a mouse in a dream by Ibn Sirin. A mouse in one dream. Seeing a mouse in a dream as narrated by Ibn Shaheen can be interpreted as follows: Seeing a mouse in a dream indicates the presence of a malicious and dishonest person in her life who is trying to harm her. The entry of a mouse indicates To a single man’s house, to a woman entering the house, and the life of a woman with a disreputable character and morals. A mouse in a dream symbolizes your stress, anxiety, and problems. Extreme fear and screaming when you see a mouse in an unmarried woman’s dream is evidence of intense fear of the future. A dead mouse in an unmarried woman’s dream, which It was mentioned in Ibn Sirin’s narration about killing a rat in a dream. We mention the following: Seeing a dead rat indicates the death of one of his family members. Stepping on a single rat indicates the problems that she will face in her life. Killing a rat in a dream for an unmarried woman symbolizes getting rid of evil people in her life. , whether they are friends or those who want to marry her. Killing individual mice in a dream is a sign that she will get rid of bad and sad situations and replace them with what is good for her. A dead mouse in a dream indicates defeat and victory over enemies. Seeing a mouse in a married woman’s dream. As for what Al-Nabulsi said About a married woman who saw a mouse in a dream, we say the following: White and black mice in a married woman’s dream symbolize night and day. Killing a mouse in a dream for a married woman indicates overcoming enemies and getting rid of them, as well as changing circumstances for the better. A married woman’s vision of a mouse digging in her house Evidence that there is a thief hiding in her house and trying to steal from her, so you should be careful after seeing this dream. A mouse eating a married woman’s dress represents a warning message to her about the necessity of getting closer to God through worship and obedience and staying away from sins. Interpretation of seeing a gray mouse in The interpretation of a mouse in a dream varies depending on its color, and we will explain it in detail in the following points: A gray mouse in a dream indicates the presence of a cunning person in the life of the fortuneteller who hides evil within himself. A gray mouse in a dream can indicate the disease that the dreamer suffers from. If the dreamer kills him in a dream, he will be cured by the command of God Almighty. The black mouse is a strong and cunning enemy that can hide the fortuneteller and harm him, and by killing him in a dream, the fortuneteller gets rid of him in reality and overcomes him. While the white mouse shows a weak enemy that is easy to discover and overcome, and it can also indicate a deficiency. Money. A red mouse indicates the death of someone you love soon

title: Interpretation of killing a gecko in a dream

preview.html: “They said there are small dreams and we do not interpret dreams with knowledge.” Some of them are considered good news for the fortuneteller, and some of them represent an unpleasant vision in a dream that you must pay attention to. In this article from the encyclopedia, we show you the interpretations of seeing a gecko in a dream and killing him. Interpretation of killing a gecko in a dream. The stomach is one of the most common reptiles that causes feelings of fear and nausea. It has an unpleasant appearance for many, but the Messenger of God, may God bless him and grant him peace, ordered the killing of geckos. He blew on the fire in which Abraham, peace be upon him, was placed to burn him, and all the animals were extinguishing it except the stomach. According to Umm Shariq, she said: The Messenger of God, may God bless him and grant him peace, ordered the killing of the lizard, so he said: Strike Abraham, peace be upon him. An authentic hadith in Sahih Al-Bukhari. Interpretation of Ibn Sirin’s dream in a dreamIbn Sirin is one of the imams of dream interpretation, and he said about seeing the stomach in a dream as follows: Interpretation of a person seeing geckos in a dream. It indicates the presence of enemies of religion, criminals, and murderers. Ibn Sirin believes that seeing the stomach in a dream indicates the presence of jinn or devils. This is due to the similarity between them, the weight of lightness, speed, and difficulty of killing. Also, seeing a body in a dream indicates the existence of projects aimed at spreading discord, discord, and sedition. If a person sees a gecko in a dream. It indicates the presence of magic in the life of the dreamer and must be fortified by reading Surah Al-Baqarah. If someone sees a gecko in pajamas, he will leave. This indicates the escape of the sinner or the pioneer escaping from his duties and troubles. Ibn Sirin also believes that seeing a gecko indicates a skin disease. Interpretation of a married woman’s dream: If a married woman sees in her dream that she is killing a stingray, this indicates that she will get rid of all the worries and problems that she faces in her life. Marital, at work, etc. Also, to dream of a married woman killing a gecko, means that she will enjoy abundant prosperity. If a married woman sees in her dream a stomach. This indicates the presence of many disagreements and problems in her family life. A gecko in a single woman’s dream. Seeing a gecko in a dream for an unmarried woman means that there is a lot of hatred, envy, and magic on the part of some people in her life. If an unmarried girl sees a stomach in her dream, This indicates the presence of evil from those close to her. But if a girl dreams that she is killing a gecko. This indicates that she will overcome all the problems and misfortunes in her life. Also, killing a gecko in a dream indicates the girl’s victory over her lurking enemies. But if an unmarried girl sees a gecko running away in her dream. This indicates the need to be careful in choosing her romantic relationships. Seeing a gecko in a dream for a single girl means that there are some people who are harming her life in reality. Seeing a gecko in a dream also means that she will meet a hypocritical person in her life. If a girl sees A married woman whose stomach color changes in her dream. This shows that there are many hypocrites in her life who show her friendship and she actually has a lot of hatred. to get
